messages.title: DO YOU WANT TO:
messages.content:
A. Balance the budget
B. Protect our schools
C. Both of these

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protecting schools from cuts and blocking plans to allow companies to profit from them.

issues.education: The leaflet emphasizes protecting schools from budget cuts.

housing.content: The leaflet includes a message against schools being put up for sale to companies for profit.

images.caption: Not for sale sign on a building.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet features an option for constituents to send a message opposing the sale of schools to companies for profit.
